column9: Business dinner mid week, the food was authentic and lovely, served by attentive staff and described in detail by the chef himself. A gem of a place!

This place has nothing going for it except the ambiance. Everything else was bad.

column7: Great atmosphere... order the fish tacos
column9: We loved the cozy atmosphere of the restaurant! The fish tacos were GREAT... in general the tacos were our favorite dish we tried. The flan for dessert was also really good.  We also tried a mole and the quesadillas and they were just OK.

Went on a date with the hubby a couple of months ago and ordered the days special which was tacos and beef. Second bite in i happened to bite into a tiny piece of bone which literally broke a bit of one of my back...More

Nice & friendly environment...
All the food is fresh and homemade providing real taste of Mexican food. Nachos are homemade and really need your attention with a cup of guacamole!
Tacos are tasty (chicken & fish one), and team is really nice...
Enjoy

column7: Very good food, nice atmosphere, easy to talk and here each other.
column9: Calm atmosphere, the staff give there guests time. Genuine mexican food, to make a reservation is a must.

Such a nice place. The food is beautiful and people are incredible nice. Good wine selection.
I suggest you the chili! Tasty and with really soft meat!
First time here. Great experience with superb food and perfectly matched beverages. Very affordable prices, with quick and helpful service!

column7: One of the best latin-american in the region
